SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI

Class MarketView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI.MarketView
public class MarketView extends Object
The MarketView class represents the market view in the game. It handles the display of the market cards and the player view in the terminal user interface (TUI).

    • MarketView

      public MarketView()
      Constructs a new MarketView. Initializes the playerTexts, marketCards, commonGoal, and asciiMarketCards lists.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MarketView getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the MarketView. If the instance does not exist, it is created.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the MarketView

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the MarketView and sets isStarted to true.

    • cleanPlayers

      public void cleanPlayers()
      Clears the player texts.

    • updateMarketView

      public void updateMarketView(List<String> market)
      Updates the market view with the given market cards. Waits for the MarketView to be started before updating.
      Parameters:
      market - the list of market cards

    • printMarketTUI

      public ArrayList<String> printMarketTUI(ArrayList<String> output)
      Prints the market view in the terminal user interface (TUI).
      Parameters:
      output - the list of strings to be printed
      Returns:
      the list of strings to be printed

    • updatePlayerView

      public void updatePlayerView(Stack<String> players, Stack<Long> pings, Stack<Integer> points)
      Updates the player view with the given players, pings and points.
      Parameters:
      players - list of players in the game in the order they joined.
      pings - list of pings of the players. The order is the same as the player list.
      points - list of points of the players.

    • showPlayerOrderedByPoints

      private static void showPlayerOrderedByPoints(int i, ArrayList<String> playerTexts)
      Shows the player ordered by points in the player view.
      Parameters:
      i - index of the player to show in the player view.
      playerTexts - list of player texts to be shown in the player view.

    • waitForStart

      private void waitForStart()
      Waits for the game to be started before updating the player view.

    • updatePlayerTexts

      private void updatePlayerTexts(Stack<String> players, Stack<Long> pings, Stack<Integer> points)
      Updates the current player texts to be shown in the player view.
      Parameters:
      players - Stack of the players in the game in the order they joined.
      pings - Stack of the players ping. The order is the same as the player list.
      points - Stack of the players points to be shown.
